8240.name: Sam & Max 105: Reality 2.0
8240.description:
With an internet crisis looming and a viral video game holding its players hostage, Sam & Max will need to slip into a new reality to set things right. But can the Freelance Police crack this virtual case in time to avoid worldwide system failure?
  • One of six self-contained cases with an overarching story arc.
  • Simple point & click interface with a low learning curve.
  • Catchy jazz soundtrack featuring live performers and over three hours of original music.
  • Intuitive gameplay that appeals to new players as well as adventure-game diehards.
  • And it's funny!
8240.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 意大利语
